name: Tyrone Leinster's Debt Dream
description:
Tyrone Leinster is having another one of his debt dreams. He can’t help dreaming about paying off debts. His biggest fantasy is forcing notorious gangsters, such as Jal Capone, to pay THEIR debts. Can you make Tyrone’s debt dream come true?

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 44 under restrictions of the theme: Your life is currency.

Best played in fullscreen outside of browser. Browser tends to screw with some of the audio and changing in and out of fullscreen will bugger some of the UI text.
